subject: Re: [junit] Junit Test
msgSnippet: ... Folks: buy this book. I m reviewing it now. It s very good, and Lasse deserves your beer. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info Your guide
messageBody:
Lasse Koskela wrote:

> I happen to be in the process of writing longer "answers" to these
> questions into what will become a book on test-driven development but
> I'm afraid it'll still take a few months before it's going to be
> available.

Folks: buy this book. I'm reviewing it now. It's very good, and Lasse
deserves your beer.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
